heroDescription: Performance determines the winner. A continuous challenge based on merit, consistency, and improvement.
performanceDescription: Participants earn points over time by completing activities and challenges inside the platform.
progressiveRewardDescription: The prize pool grows continuously until it reaches the defined goal. No randomness. No shortcuts.
publicRankingDescription: Full transparency with a public leaderboard showing who is leading based on total score.
meritOverLuckDescription: There are no lotteries or random draws. When the prize goal is reached, the top-ranked participant is declared the winner and receives the reward according to the challenge rules.
longTermThinkersDescription: Perfect for people who enjoy long-term challenges and continuous progress.
healthyCompetitionDescription: Compete fairly, track your evolution, and climb the ranking through dedication.
consistentGrowthDescription: Every action matters. Consistency is the key to winning.
securePasswordDescription: Choose a strong password to keep your account secure.
registerDescription: Register with your personal details to use all of site features

footer_description: This application offers a continuous, performance-based challenge where participants progress through measurable activities and rankings. Results are determined solely by performance and consistency, with full transparency and clear rules.
